This item is perfect for mages who rely on high ability power ratios and want to significantly increase their damage output.
It provides a huge bonus to ability power and magic penetration.
The "Overkill" effect increases your ability power by 20-45%, depending on the level, significantly enhancing your magical abilities and attacks.
This item is especially useful against enemy teams that lack magic resistance or have squishy targets, as it allows you to significantly boost your damage and deal massive magic damage.
